name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
February 24: Interviewing new students, review of last semester's contents
March 2: Lesson 4 - Colors, my apartment
March 9: Lesson 4 - high numbers, reading adverts, making dialogs
March 16: Lesson 4 - listening and reading exercise, review
March 23: Lesson 4 - Test, photo story lesson 5 (my day)
March 30: Lesson 5 - Giving the time, activities at home
April 13: Lesson 5 - My schedule from Monday to Friday
April 20: Lesson 5 - Time of the day, opening hours
April 27: Lesson 5 - One day in Berlin, review, test
May 4: Lesson 6 - Talking about the weather
May 11: Lesson 6 - Introducing new grammar: Akkusativ
May 18: Lesson 6 - Positive answer on negative questions, freetime
May 25: Lesson 6 - Review weather, weekend activities, test
June 1: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "können"
June 8: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "wollen", introduction new grammar: Perfekt
June 15: Lesson 7 - Practicing Perfekt, learning languages, review
June 22: Lesson 7 - Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
